actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Environment, Credit and Rural Development.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Environment, Credit and Rural Development

official_title: To amend the Rural Electrification Act of 1936 to eliminate the requirement that central station service be unavailable in the case of rural electrification loans.

summary.text: Amends the Rural Electrification Act of 1936 to eliminate the requirement that central station service be unavailable in the case of rural electrification loans.

titles.title: To amend the Rural Electrification Act of 1936 to eliminate the requirement that central station service be unavailable in the case of rural electrification loans.
